QuestData.Title: Elementary!
QuestData.Description: <You can't read the text, but diagrams seem to indicate that the devices around you should be activated in a set order.>$B$B<One passage of the Apocrypha has been translated to modern text:>$B$B In the beginning was shadow eternal.$B Hate blazed forth, and FIRE was born.$B Wounds scabbed, and so begat EARTH.$B Cries of anguish birthed howling WIND.$B Wherein the skies wept seas of TEARS.$B We live in the shadow,$B The world we know$B Built of rage, hurt, anguish and sorrow.
QuestData.LogDescription: Activate the four nearby elemental crucibles in the correct order to take control of the Eye of Twilight.
QuestData.CompletionText: <You pour over the Apocrypha, trying to make sense of it all.>
QuestData.RewardText: <Flush with the energies of the captured elementals, you stand before the Twilight Apocrypha. The pages turn of their own accord.>$B$B<Suddenly, you see what the Eye sees. It is yours to command!>
